/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by towering buildings and construction cranes, indicating a city in the throes of growth and development. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
